title: Add --project filter to tk list
description:
Add --project filter flag to list command in cmd/list.go.

Implementation:
- Add --project string flag
- Filter ticks where project matches exactly
- Ticks with empty project excluded when filter set
- Combine with existing filters (type, status, parent, etc.)

Test cases:
- List with project filter returns only matching
- List with project excludes empty-project ticks
- Combine with other filters
acceptance_criteria: Filter works correctly, combines with existing filters, tests pass
